oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Nurses Defend Shorter Hours - And Deny Differences With Two Hospitals"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medicine; nursing; women; 1940s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Miss Frances Cunningham, president of District No. 1, Tennessee State Nurses Association, said today that she was 'distressed and indignant' over a report that the Nurses' Official Bureau had had differences with two hospitals over employment of practical nurses replacing trained nurses..."
